name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gmail Auto Pop Out Reply Forward Show CC BCC

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In Gmail, auto pop out reply, reply all, forward, show CC/BCC/Subject

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Automatically pops-out replies, replies-all, and forwards
- Automatically shows the CC and BCC fields
- Automatically shows the Subject Line
- Option to show Send & Archive button on pop out

7-day FREE trial (no credit card needed) - $12 a year thereafter

Saves multiple clicks in Gmail and simplifies your workflow. Try it today free!

NOTE: Not compatible with GMass or Eno by Capital One. This extension will not function properly if you also use either of those extensions.
